FuncDef: The reset l2-multicast egress statistics command clears statistics about downstream Layer 2 IPv4 multicast packets.
CLIs: reset l2-multicast egress statistics { vlan <vlan-id> | vsi <vsi-name> | bd <bd-id> } [ <source-address> ] <group-address> slot <slot-id>
reset l2-multicast egress statistics slot <slot-id> all

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the VLAN ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1~4094.

Specifies a VSI name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a bridge-domain instance ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Specifies a multicast source address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a multicast group address.
The value ranges from 224.0.1.0 to 239.255.255.255, in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a slot ID. The value range varies with the hardware of the router.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] reset l2-multicast egress statistics vsi vsi1 10.10.10.10 225.0.0.1 slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about downstream Layer 2 IPv4 multicast packets, run the reset l2-multicast egress statistics command.
Prerequisites
The function of collecting statistics about downstream Layer 2 IPv4 multicast packets has been enabled
